Stargate Api Docs!¶

Note

This project is currently under development.

Stargate is a framework for exposing RESTFul JSON APIs in Flask framework. It is backed by SQLAlchemy. Feature includes: resource based endpoints, custom validations, support for view decorators, pagination, filters, sorting, grouping, resource expansion and partial responses.

User’s guide¶

  • Installation and Running
  • Quickstart
  • Guidelines on creating API Endpoints
